name: The PARAMOUNT LINE, INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator

parties: The PARAMOUNT LINE, INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.
SHEA, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Winograd, Shine & Zacks, P.C., Richard W. Zacks, Allen P. Rubine, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles Edwin Goldkamp, Legal Officer (Taxation) Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
The PARAMOUNT LINE, INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 82-448-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Dec. 2, 1982.
Winograd, Shine & Zacks, P.C., Richard W. Zacks, Allen P. Rubine, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Charles Edwin Goldkamp, Legal Officer (Taxation) Providence, for respondent.
